page.title: 17Sport at Glenalmond
page.content: The sporting fixtures are against a number of different teams. Most are between other Scottish public schools, but some, notably in Cricket and Hockey are played against club teams. For instance, the Cricket 1st XI plays against the M.C.C. amongst others. There are hockey fixtures against teams from Perth, for instance, a team from General Accident. Without a doubt, though, the main fixture for any sport is that against our Perthshire neighbours, Strathallan. There are differing attitudes to the sports played. The main clash of opinions is about Rugby. Many do not like it, and do not like being forced to play it. It is normally the case that they do like Soccer, and many arguments can be heard about the merits of the two sports.
